name: Captain N'ghathrod
oracle_text:
Horrors you control have menace.
Whenever a Horror you control deals combat damage to a player, that player mills that many cards.
At the beginning of your end step, choose target artifact or creature card in an opponent's graveyard that was put there from their library this turn. Put it onto the battlefield under your control.
set_name: Commander Legends: Battle for Baldur's Gate

name: Faldorn, Dread Wolf Herald
oracle_text:
Whenever you cast a spell from exile or a land enters the battlefield under your control from exile, create a 2/2 green Wolf creature token.
{1}, {T}, Discard a card: Exile the top card of your library. You may play it this turn.
set_name: Commander Legends: Battle for Baldur's Gate
flavor_text: "Cities are a blight on the beauty of nature."

name: Nalia de'Arnise
oracle_text:
You may look at the top card of your library any time.
You may cast Cleric, Rogue, Warrior, and Wizard spells from the top of your library.
At the beginning of combat on your turn, if you have a full party, put a +1/+1 counter on each creature you control and those creatures gain deathtouch until end of turn.
set_name: Commander Legends: Battle for Baldur's Gate

name: Firkraag, Cunning Instigator
oracle_text:
Flying, haste
Whenever one or more Dragons you control attack an opponent, goad target creature that player controls.
Whenever a creature deals combat damage to one of your opponents, if that creature had to attack this combat, you put a +1/+1 counter on Firkraag, Cunning Instigator and you draw a card.
set_name: Commander Legends: Battle for Baldur's Gate

name: Folk Hero
oracle_text: Commander creatures you own have "Whenever you cast a spell that shares a creature type with this creature, draw a card. This ability triggers only once each turn."
set_name: Commander Legends: Battle for Baldur's Gate

name: Mountain
set_name: Secret Lair Drop

name: Wild Growth
oracle_text:
Enchant land
Whenever enchanted land is tapped for mana, its controller adds an additional {G}.
set_name: Media Inserts

name: Nighthawk Scavenger
oracle_text:
Flying, deathtouch, lifelink
Nighthawk Scavenger's power is equal to 1 plus the number of card types among cards in your opponents' graveyards. (Cards in graveyards have only the characteristics of their front face.)
set_name: Commander Legends: Battle for Baldur's Gate
flavor_text: Under Drana's leadership, vampires are finding new strength in unity.

name: Mindblade Render
oracle_text: Whenever your opponents are dealt combat damage, if any of that damage was dealt by a Warrior, you draw a card and you lose 1 life.
set_name: Commander Legends: Battle for Baldur's Gate
flavor_text: "There will be no secrets between us... like it or not."

name: Mardu Strike Leader
oracle_text:
Whenever Mardu Strike Leader attacks, create a 2/1 black Warrior creature token.
Dash {3}{B} (You may cast this spell for its dash cost. If you do, it gains haste, and it's returned from the battlefield to its owner's hand at the beginning of the next end step.)
set_name: Commander Legends: Battle for Baldur's Gate

name: Malakir Blood-Priest
oracle_text: When Malakir Blood-Priest enters the battlefield, each opponent loses X life and you gain X life, where X is the number of creatures in your party. (Your party consists of up to one each of Cleric, Rogue, Warrior, and Wizard.)
set_name: Commander Legends: Battle for Baldur's Gate
flavor_text: "From your veins to mine."

name: In Garruk's Wake
oracle_text: Destroy all creatures you don't control and all planeswalkers you don't control.
set_name: Commander Legends: Battle for Baldur's Gate
flavor_text: Beyond pain, beyond obsession and wild despair, there lies a place of twisted power only the most tormented souls can reach.

name: Puppeteer Clique
oracle_text:
Flying
When Puppeteer Clique enters the battlefield, put target creature card from an opponent's graveyard onto the battlefield under your control. It gains haste. At the beginning of your next end step, exile it.
Persist (When this creature dies, if it had no -1/-1 counters on it, return it to the battlefield under its owner's control with a -1/-1 counter on it.)
set_name: Commander Legends: Battle for Baldur's Gate

name: Pontiff of Blight
oracle_text:
Extort (Whenever you cast a spell, you may pay {W/B}. If you do, each opponent loses 1 life and you gain that much life.)
Other creatures you control have extort. (If a creature has multiple instances of extort, each triggers separately.)
set_name: Commander Legends: Battle for Baldur's Gate

name: Plague Spitter
oracle_text:
At the beginning of your upkeep, Plague Spitter deals 1 damage to each creature and each player.
When Plague Spitter dies, Plague Spitter deals 1 damage to each creature and each player.
set_name: Commander Legends: Battle for Baldur's Gate

name: Phyrexian Rager
oracle_text: When Phyrexian Rager enters the battlefield, you draw a card and you lose 1 life.
set_name: Commander Legends: Battle for Baldur's Gate
flavor_text:
"I believe many worlds will bow to Phyrexia. Mirrodin is merely the first."
—Sheoldred, Whispering One

name: Nihilith
oracle_text:
Fear (This creature can't be blocked except by artifact creatures and/or black creatures.)
Suspend 7—{1}{B} (Rather than cast this card from your hand, you may pay {1}{B} and exile it with seven time counters on it. At the beginning of your upkeep, remove a time counter. When the last is removed, cast it without paying its mana cost. It has haste.)
Whenever a card is put into an opponent's graveyard from anywhere, if Nihilith is suspended, you may remove a time counter from Nihilith.
set_name: Commander Legends: Battle for Baldur's Gate

name: Thwart the Grave
oracle_text:
This spell costs {1} less to cast for each creature in your party. (Your party consists of up to one each of Cleric, Rogue, Warrior, and Wizard.)
Return target creature card and up to one target Cleric, Rogue, Warrior, or Wizard creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield.
set_name: Commander Legends: Battle for Baldur's Gate

name: Syphon Mind
oracle_text: Each other player discards a card. You draw a card for each card discarded this way.
set_name: Commander Legends: Battle for Baldur's Gate
flavor_text: When tempers run high, it's easy to lose your head.

name: Ravenous Chupacabra
oracle_text: When Ravenous Chupacabra enters the battlefield, destroy target creature an opponent controls.
set_name: Commander Legends: Battle for Baldur's Gate
flavor_text: Opening Orazca unleashed more horrors than just the Immortal Sun.

name: Zulaport Cutthroat
oracle_text: Whenever Zulaport Cutthroat or another creature you control dies, each opponent loses 1 life and you gain 1 life.
set_name: Commander Legends: Battle for Baldur's Gate
flavor_text: "Eldrazi? Ha! Try walking through Zulaport at night with your pockets full. Now *that's* dangerous."

name: Woe Strider
oracle_text:
When Woe Strider enters the battlefield, create a 0/1 white Goat creature token.
Sacrifice another creature: Scry 1.
Escape—{3}{B}{B}, Exile four other cards from your graveyard. (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its escape cost.)
Woe Strider escapes with two +1/+1 counters on it.
set_name: Commander Legends: Battle for Baldur's Gate

name: The Akroan War
oracle_text:
(As this Saga enters and after your draw step, add a lore counter. Sacrifice after III.)
I — Gain control of target creature for as long as The Akroan War remains on the battlefield.
II — Until your next turn, creatures your opponents control attack each combat if able.
III — Each tapped creature deals damage to itself equal to its power.
set_name: Commander Legends: Battle for Baldur's Gate

name: Bonecrusher Giant // Stomp

card_faces.name: Bonecrusher Giant
card_faces.oracle_text: Whenever Bonecrusher Giant becomes the target of a spell, Bonecrusher Giant deals 2 damage to that spell's controller.
card_faces.flavor_text: Not every tale ends in glory.

card_faces.name: Stomp
card_faces.oracle_text: Damage can't be prevented this turn. Stomp deals 2 damage to any target.

set_name: Commander Legends: Battle for Baldur's Gate
flavor_text: Not every tale ends in glory.

name: Blasphemous Act
oracle_text:
This spell costs {1} less to cast for each creature on the battlefield.
Blasphemous Act deals 13 damage to each creature.
set_name: Commander Legends: Battle for Baldur's Gate
flavor_text:
"Holy places are no longer sanctuary from death, and death is no longer sanctuary from anything."
—Thalia, Knight-Cathar

name: Avatar of Slaughter
oracle_text: All creatures have double strike and attack each combat if able.
set_name: Commander Legends: Battle for Baldur's Gate
flavor_text:
"Diplomacy has solved nothing. Only bloodspill can end this now. Call forth the warbringer."
—Basandra, Battle Seraph

name: Aurora Phoenix
oracle_text:
Flying
Cascade (When you cast this spell, exile cards from the top of your library until you exile a nonland card that costs less. You may cast it without paying its mana cost. Put the exiled cards on the bottom of your library in a random order.)
Whenever you cast a spell with cascade, return Aurora Phoenix from your graveyard to your hand.
set_name: Commander Legends: Battle for Baldur's Gate

name: Agitator Ant
oracle_text: At the beginning of your end step, each player may put two +1/+1 counters on a creature they control. Goad each creature that had counters put on it this way. (Until your next turn, those creatures attack each combat if able and attack a player other than you if able.)
set_name: Commander Legends: Battle for Baldur's Gate

name: Demon Bolt
oracle_text:
Demon Bolt deals 4 damage to target creature or planeswalker.
Foretell {R} (During your turn, you may pay {2} and exile this card from your hand face down. Cast it on a later turn for its foretell cost.)
set_name: Commander Legends: Battle for Baldur's Gate
flavor_text:
"Burn them from the sky."
—Varragoth

name: Curse of Opulence
oracle_text:
Enchant player
Whenever enchanted player is attacked, create a Gold token. Each opponent attacking that player does the same. (A Gold token is an artifact with "Sacrifice this artifact: Add one mana of any color.")
set_name: Commander Legends: Battle for Baldur's Gate
flavor_text: Jingling coins beckon many an eager hand.

name: Chaos Warp
oracle_text: The owner of target permanent shuffles it into their library, then reveals the top card of their library. If it's a permanent card, they put it onto the battlefield.
set_name: Commander Legends: Battle for Baldur's Gate

name: Chaos Dragon
oracle_text:
Flying, haste
Chaos Dragon attacks each combat if able.
At the beginning of combat on your turn, each player rolls a d20. If one or more opponents had the highest result, Chaos Dragon can't attack those players or planeswalkers they control this combat.
set_name: Commander Legends: Battle for Baldur's Gate

name: Chain Reaction
oracle_text: Chain Reaction deals X damage to each creature, where X is the number of creatures on the battlefield.
set_name: Commander Legends: Battle for Baldur's Gate
flavor_text:
"We train for the improbable, like lightning striking the same place twice, or striking everywhere at once."
—Nundari, Sea Gate militia captain

name: Brash Taunter
oracle_text:
Indestructible
Whenever Brash Taunter is dealt damage, it deals that much damage to target opponent.
{2}{R}, {T}: Brash Taunter fights another target creature.
set_name: Commander Legends: Battle for Baldur's Gate
flavor_text: "You hit like a kobold!"

name: Dream Pillager
oracle_text:
Flying
Whenever Dream Pillager deals combat damage to a player, exile that many cards from the top of your library. Until end of turn, you may cast spells from among those exiled cards.
set_name: Commander Legends: Battle for Baldur's Gate
flavor_text: Its wings shimmer with dreams absorbed from its enemies.

name: Drakuseth, Maw of Flames
oracle_text:
Flying
Whenever Drakuseth, Maw of Flames attacks, it deals 4 damage to any target and 3 damage to each of up to two other targets.
set_name: Commander Legends: Battle for Baldur's Gate
flavor_text:
"Spread out, you idiots! Spread out!"
—Marsden, party leader, last words

name: Disrupt Decorum
oracle_text: Goad all creatures you don't control. (Until your next turn, those creatures attack each combat if able and attack a player other than you if able.)
set_name: Commander Legends: Battle for Baldur's Gate
flavor_text: Dinner and politics don't mix.

name: Dire Fleet Daredevil
oracle_text:
First strike
When Dire Fleet Daredevil enters the battlefield, exile target instant or sorcery card from an opponent's graveyard. You may cast it this turn, and you may spend mana as though it were mana of any type to cast that spell. If that spell would be put into a graveyard this turn, exile it instead.
set_name: Commander Legends: Battle for Baldur's Gate

name: Ignite the Future
oracle_text:
Exile the top three cards of your library. Until the end of your next turn, you may play those cards. If this spell was cast from a graveyard, you may play cards this way without paying their mana costs.
Flashback {7}{R} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)
set_name: Commander Legends: Battle for Baldur's Gate

name: Greater Gargadon
oracle_text:
Suspend 10—{R}
Sacrifice an artifact, creature, or land: Remove a time counter from Greater Gargadon. Activate only if Greater Gargadon is suspended.
set_name: Commander Legends: Battle for Baldur's Gate

name: Goblin Spymaster
oracle_text:
First strike
At the beginning of each opponent's end step, that player creates a 1/1 red Goblin creature token with "Creatures you control attack each combat if able."
set_name: Commander Legends: Battle for Baldur's Gate
flavor_text:
"Infiltrate and infuriate!"
—Goblin Espionage League motto

name: Geode Rager
oracle_text:
First strike
Landfall — Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, goad each creature target player controls. (Until your next turn, those creatures attack each combat if able and attack a player other than you if able.)
set_name: Commander Legends: Battle for Baldur's Gate
flavor_text: Its crystalline core refracts light into chaos.

name: Etali, Primal Storm
oracle_text: Whenever Etali, Primal Storm attacks, exile the top card of each player's library, then you may cast any number of spells from among those cards without paying their mana costs.
set_name: Commander Legends: Battle for Baldur's Gate
flavor_text: The storm rages and the earth breaks.

name: Embereth Shieldbreaker // Battle Display

card_faces.name: Embereth Shieldbreaker
card_faces.flavor_text: "Courage is the only shield I need."

flavor_text: "Courage is the only shield I need."

oracle_text:
Mizzium Mortars deals 4 damage to target creature you don't control.
Overload {3}{R}{R}{R} (You may cast this spell for its overload cost. If you do, change its text by replacing all instances of "target" with "each.")
set_name: Commander Legends: Battle for Baldur's Gate

name: Light Up the Stage
oracle_text:
Spectacle {R} (You may cast this spell for its spectacle cost rather than its mana cost if an opponent lost life this turn.)
Exile the top two cards of your library. Until the end of your next turn, you may play those cards.
set_name: Commander Legends: Battle for Baldur's Gate
flavor_text:
"Places, everyone!"
—Judith

name: Laelia, the Blade Reforged
oracle_text:
Haste
Whenever Laelia, the Blade Reforged attacks, exile the top card of your library. You may play that card this turn.
Whenever one or more cards are put into exile from your library and/or your graveyard, put a +1/+1 counter on Laelia.
set_name: Commander Legends: Battle for Baldur's Gate

name: Kazuul, Tyrant of the Cliffs
oracle_text: Whenever a creature an opponent controls attacks, if you're the defending player, create a 3/3 red Ogre creature token unless that creature's controller pays {3}.
set_name: Commander Legends: Battle for Baldur's Gate
flavor_text: Warning to those who scale the cliffs without paying tribute: It's a long way down.

name: Jeska's Will
oracle_text:
Choose one. If you control a commander as you cast this spell, you may choose both.
• Add {R} for each card in target opponent's hand.
• Exile the top three cards of your library. You may play them this turn.
set_name: Commander Legends: Battle for Baldur's Gate
flavor_text:
"Gather your strength. Prepare yourself."
—Jeska, to Radha

name: Izzet Chemister
oracle_text:
Haste
{R}, {T}: Exile target instant or sorcery card from your graveyard.
{1}{R}, {T}, Sacrifice Izzet Chemister: Cast any number of cards exiled with Izzet Chemister without paying their mana costs.
set_name: Commander Legends: Battle for Baldur's Gate
